events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this refund request to ensure timely support.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'm here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and pictures of the item you received so we can verify your claim?
Here is my order number 789123 and I have attached photos showing the wrong product that arrived instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for quickly addressing my concern and agreeing to the refund. I appreciate your prompt help.
Your refund has been initiated and the case is now resolved. If you need further assistance, please let us know.
We are following up to ensure that you received your refund successfully and are satisfied with the resolution.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your experience with our refund process.
